title: MasterChef
overview: The biggest TV cooking competition, synonymous with success, the absolute ruler of its genre returns and nothing is the same!The three top chef judges, Panos Ioannidis, Sotiris Kontizas and Leonidas Koutsopoulos, take their positions and the wonderfully exciting adventure of MasterChef 2024 begins! The three chefs of our heart are looking for bold, creative cooks, with original ideas, culinary energy, extreme culinary approaches, who will present dishes with imagination, inspiration, quality, deliciousness! Among them will be the next MasterChef!!
